resources.string: Physician certifies that condition listed below as been met.
1.Physician is familiar with child physical condition and the child has been diagonesd at the time of referral with an illness on the medical list of the Make-A-Wish Foundation of India
2.Physician is familiar with child physical condition and the child has been diagonesd at the time of referral with a medical condition that is considered life-threatening
Physician identifies the following medical restrictions and needs that must be considered in fulfilling the wish
Physician is familiar with patient physical condition and certifies that patient is not medically elogible at this time.
